alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Millard and south central Juab Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delta, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delta, Oak City, Leamington, Lynndyl and Little Sahara State Park. This includes the following highways... US Route 6 between mile markers 89 and 114. US Route 50 between mile markers 90 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
